sig_info: Heimdall gains a 100% chance to trigger a Precision Buff increasing Critical Rating by 228.57 to 428.29 and lasting for 10 seconds, each time a True Strike Buff activates on him.

Heimdall converts all of the Buffs active on him at the end of the previous fight into Power. Start the fight with a Power Gain Buff granting 4 to 7.47% of his Max Power per Buff converted at the beginning of the fight, over 5 seconds.

PASSIVE: When Struck by or Blocking an Opponent’s attack, Heimdall gains Passive Armor Charges.
On Reaching 100 charges they convert into an Armor Up Buff increasing Armor by 685.71 lasting 10 seconds.
When Striking or being Blocked by an Opponent, Heimdall gains Passive Fury charges
On reaching 100 charges they convert into a Fury Buff increasing Attack by 15 lasting 10 seconds
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Convert 1 active Fury, Armor Up, Precision, or Aptitude Buff, triggered by Heimdall’s abilities, into one with an infinite Duration.
Heimdall can have a maximum of 5 of these Buffs at a time.
TRUE SIGHT - PASSIVE: Every time he activates a Special Attack, Heimdall gains a permanent True Strike Buff as long as he doesn’t already have one active. This Buff is lost if Heimdall is Struck.

While True Strike is active Heimdall’s Attacks cannot be avoided with Dexterity, he can trigger the Parry Mastery against non-contact attacks, and has a 25% chance to Auto-Block Basic Attacks, this will trigger Parry.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to Armor Break the Opponent once for each Fury Buff more than Armor Up Buff currently active on Heimdall. These Armor Breaks reduce Armor by 84.21 and last for 10 seconds
100% chance to gain a Power Gain Buff for each Armor Up Buff more than Fury Buff active on Heimdall. These Power Gains grant 12.5% of his Max Power, over 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% Chance to be Unblockable if you have least 1 Armor Up Buff.
100% Chance to Stun for 2.50 seconds if you have at least 1 Fury Buff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% Chance to grant an Aptitude Buff, increasing the potency of Armor, Fury, and Precision Buffs by 50% lasting for 15 seconds.

sig_info: Heimdall gains a 100% chance to trigger a Precision Buff increasing Critical Rating by 286.28 to 666.65 and lasting for 10 seconds, each time a True Strike Buff activates on him.

Heimdall converts all of the Buffs active on him at the end of the previous fight into Power. Start the fight with a Power Gain Buff granting 4.01 to 9% of his Max Power per Buff converted at the beginning of the fight, over 5 seconds.

PASSIVE: When Struck by or Blocking an Opponent’s attack, Heimdall gains Passive Armor Charges.
On Reaching 100 charges they convert into an Armor Up Buff increasing Armor by 857.14 lasting 10 seconds.
When Striking or being Blocked by an Opponent, Heimdall gains Passive Fury charges
On reaching 100 charges they convert into a Fury Buff increasing Attack by 230.8 lasting 10 seconds
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Convert 1 active Fury, Armor Up, Precision, or Aptitude Buff, triggered by Heimdall’s abilities, into one with an infinite Duration.
Heimdall can have a maximum of 5 of these Buffs at a time.
TRUE SIGHT - PASSIVE: Every time he activates a Special Attack, Heimdall gains a permanent True Strike Buff as long as he doesn’t already have one active. This Buff is lost if Heimdall is Struck.

While True Strike is active Heimdall’s Attacks cannot be avoided with Dexterity, he can trigger the Parry Mastery against non-contact attacks, and has a 25% chance to Auto-Block Basic Attacks, this will trigger Parry.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to Armor Break the Opponent once for each Fury Buff more than Armor Up Buff currently active on Heimdall. These Armor Breaks reduce Armor by 105.26 and last for 10 seconds
